q: Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry David West said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.

Aaron Rodgers was all smiles yesterday as a guest on "Late Show with David Letterman ." David Letterman handed Aaron Rodgers his WWE championship belt and even caught a pass across the stage from the Super Bowl MVP. There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there, Aaron Rodgers said as his eyes scanned the crowd, which was met with cheers from the probable Packer backers in attendance. David Letterman asked a series of light-hearted questions, with Aaron Rodgers willingly playing along.

Google Inc. . Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt . Photographer: Tony Avelar/Bloomberg Eric Schmidt said he is "committed to Google Inc. " and that he agrees with co-founders Sergey Brin on "everything." He said he will stay at Google Inc. as long as it is exciting. Eric Schmidt spoke to reporters in Munich today. Eric Schmidt , who will be replaced as CEO by Page on April 4, said the transition will not affect decision-making at the company.

Salesforce.com, Microsoft has rolled out a cloud-based version of its new Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 release. The online software targets what Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer called the heart of almost every successful business: Sales professionals. Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud, Steve Ballmer said. The Microsoft chief pointed to a familiar user experience that enables collaboration, streamlines processes, and accesses real-time data as key competitive benefits of Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
